option.name: PARAMETERS
option.value: --nnodes=1 --nproc_per_node=2 -m verl.trainer.fsdp_sft_trainer data.train_files=/media/wac/backup/john/johnson/RLDecisionAgent/backend/reTool/wuxibin/ReTool-SFT/data/train-00000-of-00001.parquet data.val_files=/media/wac/backup/john/johnson/RLDecisionAgent/backend/reTool/wuxibin/ReTool-SFT/data/train-00000-of-00001.parquet data.max_length=16384 data.train_batch_size=32 data.multiturn.enable=true data.multiturn.messages_key=messages data.multiturn.tools_key=tools data.micro_batch_size_per_gpu=4 model.partial_pretrain=/media/wac/backup/john/johnson/RLDecisionAgent/backend/reTool/model/Qwen2.5-0.5B-Instruct model.strategy=fsdp trainer.default_local_dir=/media/wac/backup/john/johnson/RLDecisionAgent/backend/reTool/checkpoint/multiturn-sft-Qwen2.5-0.5B-Instruct trainer.project_name=wuxibin-multiturn-sft trainer.experiment_name=multiturn-sft-Qwen2.5-0.5B-Instruct trainer.logger=["console"] trainer.total_epochs=6 ulysses_sequence_parallel_size=2 use_remove_padding=true
